excursionActivities.name: Snowy Forest Trail
excursionActivities.description: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of snow-covered trees and tranquil landscapes.
highlights: Guided tour with a local expert
Hot chocolate break at a scenic viewpoint

excursionActivities.name: Alpine Ridge Adventure
excursionActivities.description: For those seeking a more challenging experience, the Alpine Ridge Adventure offers a thrilling hike along the ridges of the Serenity Mountains.
highlights: Stop at an alpine hut for a warm meal
